column4: Does anyone know why 8.10 can't connect directly to a windows box, when 8.04 could? (I am simply connecting two computers via their lan ports. no routers or anything involved)'
giveboth an ip in the same subnet and they can ping eachother
don't rely on this 169 ip crap :p its garbage
thats "goodluck" networking lol, its much better to just set it up manually
